name: Saturday Workshop
description:
Is a coop local multi-player where you can take place on one of the four characters, and fix all the cars that you can handle, but you will need to coop all together for your workshop to be successful

This game was made in the Global Game Jam 2020 with the amezing help of:

Julia Blasco - @julia_blasco_

Joan Ortiga -  @joanortigadev

Pol Serra - @ImNot_Serra

And me

Marina Chavarria - @LadyMarinaDev
